summary: A utility class that reads data supplied via a pipe, optionally splits it into named columns, and presents the result as an iterable collection; it also provides convenient methods to persist the processed data as text or binary files, respecting an overwrite flag.
business_intent: Enable command‑line or pipeline‑based Python programs to ingest streamed input, transform it into a structured dictionary when column names are supplied, and reliably write the output to designated locations, supporting both regular and binary formats.
